metadata.titleCn: 海河流域多尺度地表通量与气象要素观测数据集：密云站-自动气象站（2008-2010）
metadata.description:
The data set contains observations from the automatic weather station as at 1 solstice, January 2008, on 29 December 2010.The site is located in xinchengzi town, miyun county, Beijing, with orchards (plums and apple trees), corn/bare land, and towns.The latitude and longitude of the observation point is 117.3233E, 40.6308N, and the altitude is 350m.
The acquisition frequency of the automatic weather station is 10s, and the output of 10min is once.The observation factors include air temperature and relative humidity (30.56m, 10.66m), and the direction is due to the north.Wind speed (30.56m, 10.66m), wind direction (30.56m), heading due north;Air pressure (installed in waterproof box);Rainfall (31.46m);The four-component radiation (30.76m) is oriented due to the south.Infrared surface temperature (30.76m), the arm is facing south, the probe is facing vertically downward;The soil temperature and humidity probe was buried 2m south of the meteorological tower. The buried depth of the soil temperature probe was 0cm, 5cm, 10cm, 20cm, 40cm, 60cm, 80cm and 100cm. The buried depth of the soil water sensor was 2cm, 5cm, 10cm, 20cm, 40cm, 60cm and 100cm.Two hot plates (2) are buried 2cm underground, one in the ground where the sun can penetrate the fruit trees, and the other in the shadow of the fruit trees.Processing and quality control of observation data :(1) ensure 144 data per day (every 10min). If data is missing, it will be marked by -6999;(2) eliminate the moments with duplicate records;(3) data that is obviously beyond the physical meaning or the range of the instrument is deleted;(4) the format of date and time is unified, and the date and time are in the same column.For example, the time is: June 10, 2010 at 10:30.
Data released by the automatic weather station include:Date/Time for the Date/Time, and the air temperature humidity observation (Ta_10. 66 m, RH_10. 66 m, Ta_30. 56 m, RH_30. 56 m) (℃, %), wind speed (Ws_10. 66 m, Ws_30. 56 m) (m/s), wind (WD) (°), pressure (Press) (hpa), precipitation (Rain) (mm), four component radiation (DR, UR, DLR, ULR, Rn) (W/m2), the surface radiation temperature (IRT_1, IRT_2) (℃),Soil heat flux (Gs_1, Gs_2) (W/m2), multi-layer soil moisture (Ms_2cm, Ms_5cm, Ms_10cm, Ms_20cm, Ms_40cm, Ms_60cm, Ms_100cm) (%) and multi-layer soil temperature (Ts_0cm, Ts_5cm, Ts_10cm, Ts_20cm, Ts_40cm, Ts_60cm, Ts_80cm, Ts_100cm) (℃).
Please refer to Jia et al,(2012) for information of observation test or site, and Liu et al,(2013) for data processing.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2008年1月1日至2010年12月29日的自动气象站观测数据。站点位于北京市密云县新城子镇，下垫面是果园（李子树和苹果树）、玉米/裸地、城镇。观测点的经纬度是117.3233E，40.6308N，海拔350m。

自动气象站的采集频率为10s，且10min输出一次。观测要素包括空气温度、相对湿度（30.56m，10.66m），朝向为正北；风速（30.56m，10.66m），风向（30.56m），朝向为正北；气压（安装在防水箱内）；雨量（31.46m）；四分量辐射（30.76m），朝向为正南；红外表面温度（30.76m），支臂朝向正南，探头朝向是垂直向下；土壤温湿度探头埋设在气象塔正南方2m处，土壤温度探头埋设深度为0cm、5cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、60cm、80cm和100cm处，土壤水分传感器埋设深度为2cm、5cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、60cm和100cm；土壤热流板（2块）埋设在地下2cm处，其中一块埋设在阳光可穿透果树林的地表，另一块埋设在果树的阴影下。观测数据的处理与质量控制：（1）确保每天144个数据（每10min），若出现数据的缺失，则由-6999标示；（2）剔除有重复记录的时刻；（3）删除了明显超出物理意义或超出仪器量程的数据；（4）日期和时间的格式统一，并且日期、时间在同一列。如，时间为：2010-6-10 10:30。
自动气象站发布的数据包括：日期/时间Date/Time，空气温湿观测（Ta_10.66m，RH_10.66m，Ta_30.56m，RH_30.56m）（℃，%），风速（Ws_10.66m，Ws_30.56m）（m/s），风向（WD）（°），气压（Press）（hpa），降水（Rain）（mm），四分量辐射（DR、UR、DLR、ULR、Rn）（W/m2），地表辐射温度（IRT_1、IRT_2）（℃），土壤热通量（Gs_1、Gs_2）（W/m2）、多层土壤水分（Ms_2cm、Ms_5cm、Ms_10cm、Ms_20cm、Ms_40cm、Ms_60cm、Ms_100cm）（%）和多层土壤温度（Ts_0cm、Ts_5cm、Ts_10cm、Ts_20cm、Ts_40cm、Ts_60cm、Ts_80cm、Ts_100cm ）（℃） 。
观测试验或站点信息请参考 Jia et al,(2012)，数据处理请参考Liu et al.(2013)。

background: The accurate estimation of water and heat fluxes is crucial to climate change research, water resource planning and management, and water-saving agriculture applications. Ground measurements are relatively accurate at the patch scale. However, the monitoring network for ground measurements is not sufficient for global coverage, and there is a need to upscale observations from the patch to the regional scale. The remote sensing method can acquire land surface information accurately at the regional scale, which creates new opportunities for monitoring water and heat fluxes. Over the last 20 years, evolving land surface models have been able to produce continuous temporal and spatial variations of water and heat fluxes. However, the land model output is strongly contaminated by uncertainties within the model parameters, model structures, and forcing data; this has adversely affected the development and application of land surface models. Considering these issues, developing a series of techniques combining land surface models with different types of observations is necessary. Data assimilation is one such technique and is one of the most advanced approaches to improving land surface model predictions. Surface temperature has been established to be a key factor for water and energy balance studies. Surface temperature influences the partitioning of incoming radiant energy into ground, as well as sensible and latent heat fluxes. Overestimating the surface temperature results in excessive estimates of sensible and soil heat fluxes, which can impact the boundary layer development and atmospheric dynamics. Underestimating the results has corresponding adverse effects. Although latent heat flux is mainly affected by soil moisture, surface temperature is an important parameter too.
research objective: This study developed two data assimilation strategies that combine the MODIS LST products with the Common Land Model (CLM). Strategy 1 improves water and heat flux estimates by adjusting soil temperature, while strategy 2 achieves this goal by adjusting soil moisture.
challenges: The monitoring network for ground measurements is not sufficient for global coverage, and there is a need to upscale observations from the patch to the regional scale. Overestimating the surface temperature results in excessive estimates of sensible and soil heat fluxes, which can impact the boundary layer development and atmospheric dynamics. Underestimating the results has corresponding adverse effects. The land model output is strongly contaminated by uncertainties within the model parameters, model structures, and forcing data; this has adversely affected the development and application of land surface models.
methods: The developed data assimilation system consists of a model operator for calculating the diurnal variations in water and heat fluxes, an observation operator for predicting surface temperature from model state variables, and an optimization scheme for optimizing the state variables, all of which are described below. In this study, two data assimilation strategies were developed to assimilate the MODIS LST products. Strategy 1 improves the estimation of water and heat fluxes by adjusting soil temperature, while strategy 2 adjusts the soil moisture. In this study, two different optimization algorithms were applied for the two strategies: the EnKF and SCE-UA.
dataset: The assimilation results were validated at six observation sites with different land cover types (grassland, cropland, and orchard) located in Germany, the United States, and China.
findings: Overall, the two strategies improved the estimates of surface temperature and water and heat fluxes by adjusting the soil temperature and moisture, respectively. Strategy 2 was superior to strategy 1 when using the same optimization algorithm. The EnKF algorithm performed slightly better than the SCE-UA algorithm when using the same strategy. Strategy 2 combined with the EnKF algorithm performed best for water and heat fluxes, and the reductions in RMSE values were 24.0 and 15.2 W m22 for the sensible and latent heat fluxes, respectively. For the results at the six experiment sites, the combination of strategy 2 with the EnKF algorithm achieved the most significant reductions in RMSE values. For surface temperature, the most significant reduction in the RMSE value was 4.0 K at the GuanTao site. The sensible heat flux had the most significant reduction in its RMSE value of 48.1 W m22 at the GuanTao site, and latent heat flux reduction was 27.8 W m22 at the Goodwin site.
backgroundCn: 水和热通量的准确估计对气候变化研究、水资源规划与管理以及节水农业应用至关重要。地面测量在小块尺度上相对准确。然而，地面测量的监测网络不足以覆盖全球，因此需要将观测结果从小块尺度上升到区域尺度。遥感方法能够在区域尺度上准确获取地表信息，这为监测水和热通量创造了新的机会。在过去的20年中，逐步发展的陆面模型能够生成水和热通量的连续时间和空间变化。然而，陆面模型的输出受到模型参数、模型结构和强迫数据中的不确定性严重污染，这对陆面模型的发展和应用产生了不利影响。考虑到这些问题，开发一系列结合陆面模型与不同类型观测的技术是必要的。数据同化就是其中一种技术，是改善陆面模型预测的最先进方法之一。地表温度已被确立为水分和能量平衡研究的关键因素。地表温度影响入射辐射能量的分配，包括地面、显热和潜热通量。高估地表温度会导致显热和土壤热通量的过度估计，这可能影响边界层的发展和大气动力学。低估结果则会产生相应的不利影响。尽管潜热通量主要受土壤湿度的影响，但地表温度也是一个重要参数。
research objectiveCn: 本研究开发了两种数据同化策略，将MODIS LST产品与常规陆地模型（CLM）结合起来。策略1通过调整土壤温度来改善水分和热量通量的估计，而策略2则通过调整土壤湿度来实现这一目标。
challengesCn: 地面测量的监测网络覆盖不足，迫切需要将观测从局部区域提升到区域尺度。表面温度的高估会导致感热和土壤热通量的过度估计，这会影响边界层的发展和大气动力学。低估结果则会产生相应的不利影响。土地模型输出受到模型参数、模型结构和强迫数据的不确定性严重污染，这对土地表面模型的发展和应用产生了不利影响。
methodsCn: 所开发的数据同化系统包括一个模型运算符，用于计算水和热通量的日变化，一个观测运算符，用于根据模型状态变量预测表面温度，以及一个优化方案，用于优化状态变量，以下将对此进行描述。在本研究中，开发了两种数据同化策略以同化MODIS LST产品。策略1通过调整土壤温度来改善水和热通量的估计，而策略2则调整土壤湿度。在本研究中，为这两种策略应用了两种不同的优化算法：EnKF和SCE-UA。
datasetCn: 同化结果在位于德国、美国和中国的六个不同土地覆盖类型（草地、农田和果园）观测站进行了验证。

background: Aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) is a key factor in surface flux estimations with remote sensing algorithms and/or land surface models. Originally, z0m is defined as the height where the wind speed, given by the extrapolation of the logarithmic wind profile, becomes zero. According to numerous observations, the variation range of z0m over different surfaces is large, from an order of 1.0 m over urban areas and mountainous areas, to an order of 0.1 mm or even 0.01 mm over smooth water body surfaces, ice and snow surfaces. The traditional way to calculate z0m is based on the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory, using wind profile measurements. In practical applications, especially for remote sensing models and land surface models, it is difficult to obtain z0m for a local or regional scale based only on station observations. Former researchers have proposed some parameterizations between the aerodynamic roughness length and the land surface properties [e.g., vegetation height, leaf area index (LAI), etc.], since wind turbulence is controlled by the structure and spacing of roughness elements (plants and other obstacles) on the land surface, and z0m describes the roughness characteristics of a surface.
research objective: Based on the data of the Xiaotangshan Experiment (Changping District of Beijing, China), which was conducted in 2002, 2004, and 2005 respectively, the objectives of this paper are: (1) to calculate z0m over different surfaces and analyze the directional characteristics of z0m over heterogeneous surfaces using an analytical footprint model; (2) to relate the estimated z0m over heterogeneous surfaces to roughness element characteristic factors, and present a heuristic parameterization of z0m as a reference for model parameterizations.
challenges: More data is needed for further discussions.
methods: This paper calculates z0m over several land surfaces, with 3 years of experimental data from Xiaotangshan. Individual z0m over each surface component (patch) is calculated firstly with the characteristic parameters of the roughness elements (vegetation height, leaf area index, etc.), then z0m over the whole experimental field is aggregated, using the footprint weighting method.
dataset: This experiment was carried out at the Xiaotangshan Experimental Station for Precision Agriculture (40°10′41′′N, 116°26′52′′E, 35 m above sea level) in Beijing. The observation period in 2002 was from 26 March to 23 April and the land cover was bare soil. In 2004, the experiment was carried out from 30 May to 7 July. In the southern sub-plot field, the land cover was bare soil between 30 May and 11 June, while the maize plants started emerging around 12 June. In 2005, the experiment was from 1 May to 10 June and the experimental layout was almost the same as that in 2004.
findings: The results show that z0m is direction-dependent, mainly due to the heterogeneity of the size and spatial distribution of the roughness elements inside the source area along different wind directions.
backgroundCn: 气动粗糙长度（z0m）是利用遥感算法和/或陆面模型进行表面通量估算的关键因素。z0m最初被定义为风速通过对数风速剖面的外推在何高度变为零。根据众多观测，不同表面上z0m的变化范围很大，城市和山区的z0m约为1.0米，而光滑水体表面、冰面和雪面上的z0m则约为0.1毫米甚至0.01毫米。传统上，z0m的计算基于Monin-Obukhov相似理论，使用风速剖面测量。在实际应用中，特别是在遥感模型和陆面模型中，仅依靠站点观测很难获得局部或区域尺度的z0m。以往研究者提出了一些气动粗糙长度与陆面特性（如植被高度、叶面积指数（LAI）等）之间的参数化关系，因为风湍流受地表粗糙元素（植物和其他障碍物）的结构和间距的控制，而z0m描述了表面的粗糙特征。
research objectiveCn: 根据2002年、2004年和2005年在中国北京昌平区进行的Xiaotangshan实验的数据，本文的目标是：(1) 计算不同表面的z0m，并使用分析足迹模型分析异质表面上z0m的方向特征；(2) 将估计的异质表面上的z0m与粗糙度元素特征因子相关联，并提出z0m的启发式参数化，以作为模型参数化的参考。
challengesCn: 需要更多数据以进行进一步讨论。
methodsCn: 本文计算了多个地表的z0m，使用了来自小汤山的三年实验数据。首先，针对每个表面组成部分（斑块）计算了单独的z0m，使用了粗糙度元素的特征参数（植被高度、叶面积指数等），然后采用足迹加权法对整个实验场的z0m进行聚合。
datasetCn: 该实验在北京的肖塘山精准农业实验站（北纬40°10′41′′，东经116°26′52′′，海拔35米）进行。2002年的观察期为3月26日至4月23日，土地覆盖为裸土。2004年，实验时间为5月30日至7月7日。在南部子区，土地覆盖在5月30日至6月11日期间为裸土，而玉米植物在6月12日左右开始出土。2005年的实验时间为5月1日至6月10日，实验布局与2004年几乎相同。
findingsCn: 结果表明，z0m是方向依赖的，主要是由于源区内粗糙元素的大小和空间分布在不同风向上的异质性。

background: 感、潜热通量作为反映地－气之间热量与水汽交换强度的重要指标，影响地－气之间的能量平衡，为不同尺度的天气系统提供物质、动力和热力来源，影响地－气之间的水循环过程。 目前传统的地表通量观测方法有许多种，如涡动相关系统（Eddy-Covariance system, EC）、波文比－能量平衡系统和空气动力学方法等。 其中，涡动相关系统是国际上公认的、最可靠的地表通量观测方法，但是观测尺度较小，其空间代表性仅有几十至几百米左右。 大孔径闪烁仪（Large Aperture Scintillometer, LAS），相对于传统的涡动相关系统，能够获得区域尺度（几百米到几公里）的平均感热通量。 由于LAS的观测尺度能较好地匹配卫星像元尺度以及数值天气预报和气候模式的网格尺度，因此，LAS的观测值能够作为遥感估算模型、数值天气预报模式和气候模式的像元／网格尺度的地面相对真值，从而对这些模型／模式进行优化和验证。 LAS的观测原理是基于莫宁－奥布霍夫相似理论（Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory, MOST），结合观测得到的大气折射指数结构参数C2n和相关的气象数据，利用与温度结构参数C2T相关的稳定度普适函数fT，得到地表的区域平均感热通量。
research objective: 利用2009年馆陶站（1－12月）和阿柔站（1－6月和10－11月）的LAS相关数据，分析了LAS观测中莫宁—奥布霍夫相似理论MOST理论的适用性，并探讨了MOST理论适用性的定量判断方法。
challenges: 由于受下垫面覆盖类型、平坦程度、水热状况和天气条件等影响，实际情况很难达到理想的水平均匀假设。 目前国内的大气相似理论研究主要集中于风、温度廓线和湍流方差的相似性关系，然而有关闪烁法中的温度结构参数与湍流特征之间的相似性研究较少。
methods: 在分析LAS数据的MOST理论适用性之前，对EC和LAS数据进行初步处理。 选取2009年馆陶站（1－12月）和阿柔站（1－6月和10－11月）的LAS、EC和AWS数据。
dataset: 馆陶站（36°30′54″N，115°07′39″E）位于河北省馆陶县河寨村，其观测场及周围下垫面为农田，包括冬小麦、玉米和棉花，其中冬小麦与玉米为轮作，冬小麦生长期为10月至次年6月，玉米生长期为6－10月，棉花生长期为5－10月，属于典型的华北平原农田下垫面。 LAS源区内冬小麦（玉米）面积约占45％，棉花约占47％。 阿柔站（38°02′40″N，100°27′53″E）位于黑河上游的河谷地区，其观测场及周围下垫面为典型的高山草地，较为平坦。 源区内的植被株高在生长旺季能达到0．2～0．3m。
findings: （1）在不稳定条件下，大尺度涡旋运动、大气湍流发展状况和温度尺度都能对MOST理论适用性产生显著影响；（2）确立了两种新的MOST理论适用性判断方法，即因子分析法和温度结构参数法，并验证了这两种判断方法是合理、可靠的。

background: For surface flux measurements, large aperture scintillometer (LAS) has become more and more popular in recent years. Compared with traditional observation techniques, it can measure surface fluxes on a larger scale (500 m to 10 km). At present, LAS observation is not common in China.
research objective: The daily and monthly variation of HLAS is analyzed. And the observation differences between eddy covariance system and LAS, need to be studied further combined with footprint model and energy unbalance of eddy covariance system observation.
challenges: There is much less agreement on the form which universal stability function fT should take. Further more, since the iteration process of HLAS can not be convergence when low wind speed and very stable conditions appearing at night, Wm \ - 5 is specified.
findings: Sensible heat flux (H) calculation with the LAS data of above measurements shows that the beam height of LAS and wind speed are sensitive factors for sensible heat flux measurement (HLAS), zero-plane displacement height is crucial unless the beam height is much larger than it, and Bowen ratio needs to be determined accurately over wet surface, while air temperature, air pressure and aerodynamic roughness length are not sensitive for HLAS. According to the observations mentioned above, LAS can measure surface fluxes both over homogeneous and heterogeneous surfaces.
backgroundCn: 对于表面通量测量，大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）近年来变得越来越受欢迎。与传统观测技术相比，它可以在更大范围内（500米到10公里）测量表面通量。目前，LAS观测在中国尚不普遍。
research objectiveCn: 对HLAS的日变化和月变化进行了分析。需要进一步研究涡度协方差系统与LAS之间的观测差异，结合足迹模型和涡度协方差系统观测的能量不平衡。
challengesCn: 关于普遍稳定函数 fT 的形式，存在很少的共识。此外，由于在低风速和夜间非常稳定的条件下，HLAS 的迭代过程无法收敛，因此指定 Wm \ - 5。
findingsCn: 利用激光雷达（LAS）数据计算显热通量（H）表明，激光雷达的光束高度和风速是显热通量测量（HLAS）的敏感因素，零平面位移高度至关重要，除非光束高度远大于它，而在湿表面上，波文比需要准确确定，而空气温度、气压和气动粗糙度长度对HLAS则不敏感。根据上述观察，激光雷达可以在均匀和非均匀表面上测量表面通量。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a method for collecting surface flux data over a regional scale, particularly in the context of agricultural or heterogeneous landscapes?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一种在区域尺度上收集表面通量数据的方法，特别是在农业或异质景观的背景下？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of such a method is the use of a Large Aperture Scintillometer (LAS), which can measure surface fluxes on a larger scale (500 m to 10 km) compared to traditional systems. The LAS observation is based on Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory and can be used for regional-scale evaluations, such as in agricultural landscapes with varying land cover like winter wheat and maize.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种这样的测量方法是使用大孔径闪烁仪（LAS），它可以在较大尺度（500米到10公里）上测量表面通量，相较于传统系统。LAS观测基于莫宁-奥布霍夫相似理论，可以用于区域尺度的评估，例如在具有不同土地覆盖的农业景观中，如冬小麦和玉米。

Example.AnswerEn: One example is the development of two data assimilation strategies that incorporate MODIS Land Surface Temperature (LST) products with the Common Land Model (CLM). Strategy 1 adjusts soil temperature to improve water and heat flux estimates, while Strategy 2 adjusts soil moisture, both enhancing model predictions.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个例子是开发了两种数据同化策略，将MODIS地表温度（LST）产品与通用陆地模型（CLM）结合。策略1调整土壤温度，以改善水分和热量通量的估计，而策略2调整土壤湿度，二者均增强了模型预测。

Definition.QuestionEn: How does the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory (MOST) apply to the measurement of sensible heat flux using large aperture scintillometers (LAS)?
Definition.QuestionCn: Monin-Obukhov相似理论（MOST）如何应用于使用大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）测量显热通量？
Definition.AnswerEn: The Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory (MOST) is used in conjunction with the large aperture scintillometer (LAS) to calculate the sensible heat flux over a region. It involves using the atmospheric refractive index structure parameter and meteorological data to derive the regional average sensible heat flux, which is important for matching the scale of satellite pixels and weather forecast models.
Definition.AnswerCn: Monin-Obukhov相似理论（MOST）与大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）结合使用，以计算一个区域的显热通量。它涉及使用大气折射率结构参数和气象数据来推导区域平均显热通量，这对于匹配卫星像素和天气预报模型的尺度非常重要。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do data collection methods using automatic meteorological stations compare to those using large aperture scintillometers in terms of spatial scale and applicability for regional assessments?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 自动气象站的数据收集方法与大孔径闪烁仪的数据收集方法在空间尺度和区域评估的适用性方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Automatic meteorological stations collect data at a high temporal resolution (every 10 seconds) but are limited to a small spatial scale, providing data that is representative of the immediate area around the station. They measure a wide range of meteorological and soil variables. In contrast, large aperture scintillometers (LAS) measure surface fluxes over a larger spatial scale (500 m to 10 km), making them more suitable for regional assessments. LAS uses Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory and is effective across both homogeneous and heterogeneous surfaces.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 自动气象站以高时间分辨率（每10秒）收集数据，但其空间范围有限，仅提供代表站点周围小范围的数据显示。它们测量多种气象和土壤变量。相比之下，大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）在更大空间尺度（500米到10公里）上测量表面通量，更适合区域评估。LAS利用Monin-Obukhov相似理论，能够在均匀和非均匀表面上有效工作。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the challenges of applying Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory to data from large aperture scintillometers differ from those faced when using data from eddy covariance systems?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 将Monin-Obukhov相似理论应用于大型孔径闪烁仪数据时所面临的挑战与使用涡度协方差系统数据时所面临的挑战有何不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The application of Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory to LAS data faces challenges such as the need for stable conditions and the difficulty of achieving convergence during low wind speed at night. Eddy covariance systems, while recognized as reliable for surface flux measurements, are limited by their small spatial scale and have challenges related to energy imbalance and footprint modeling. Furthermore, the heterogeneity of the land surface affects the applicability of the theory differently for these two methods.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 将Monin-Obukhov相似理论应用于激光雷达（LAS）数据面临挑战，例如需要稳定的条件以及在夜间低风速时难以实现收敛。尽管涡动协方差系统被认为是可靠的表面通量测量工具，但它们受到小空间尺度的限制，并且在能量失衡和足迹建模方面存在挑战。此外，地表的异质性对这两种方法的理论适用性产生了不同的影响。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What similarities and differences exist between datasets collected from automatic meteorological stations and those from experiments like the Xiaotangshan Experiment in terms of variables measured and experimental setup?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 自动气象站收集的数据集与像小汤山实验这样的实验数据集在测量变量和实验设置方面存在哪些相似性和差异？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Datasets from automatic meteorological stations focus on continuous meteorological and soil measurements at specific heights and depths, including air temperature, humidity, wind speed and direction, pressure, precipitation, radiation, and soil temperature and moisture. In contrast, the Xiaotangshan Experiment involved calculating aerodynamic roughness length over several land surfaces using experimental data collected over multiple years, focusing on variables like vegetation height and leaf area index. The Xiaotangshan setup involved field experiments with specific periods and land cover conditions, while automatic stations provide ongoing data collection.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 自动气象站的数据集专注于在特定高度和深度进行连续的气象和土壤测量，包括空气温度、湿度、风速和风向、气压、降水、辐射以及土壤温度和湿度。相比之下，Xiaotangshan实验涉及使用多年收集的实验数据计算不同地表的气动粗糙度长度，重点关注植被高度和叶面积指数等变量。Xiaotangshan的设置涉及在特定时期和土地覆盖条件下进行的现场实验，而自动气象站则提供持续的数据收集。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the challenges associated with the application of the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory (MOST) in LAS observations, and how do different environmental conditions affect its applicability?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 与在激光雷达（LAS）观测中应用Monin-Obukhov相似性理论（MOST）相关的挑战是什么？不同的环境条件如何影响其适用性？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The challenges associated with applying the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory (MOST) in LAS observations include its sensitivity to environmental conditions such as surface cover type, flatness, and weather conditions. Factors like large-scale eddies, atmospheric turbulence development, and temperature scales significantly influence MOST's applicability under unstable conditions, necessitating the use of factor analysis and temperature structure parameter methods for reliable applicability assessments.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 应用Monin-Obukhov相似理论（MOST）在激光雷达（LAS）观测中面临的挑战包括其对环境条件的敏感性，如地表覆盖类型、平坦度和天气条件。大尺度涡流、大气湍流的发展以及温度尺度等因素显著影响MOST在不稳定条件下的适用性，因此需要使用因子分析和温度结构参数方法来进行可靠的适用性评估。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is the aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) difficult to determine for regional scales, and what approaches can be used to estimate it from surface characteristics?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么在区域尺度上难以确定气动粗糙长度（z0m），可以使用哪些方法从地表特征中估计它？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Determining the aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) for regional scales is challenging due to its variation range over different surfaces and the difficulty in obtaining accurate wind profile measurements. Approaches to estimate z0m involve parameterizing it through surface characteristics such as vegetation height and leaf area index, and using analytical footprint models to relate z0m to the directional characteristics and spatial distribution of roughness elements.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 确定区域尺度的气动粗糙长度（z0m）是具有挑战性的，因为它在不同表面上的变化范围很大，并且获取准确的风速剖面测量也很困难。估计z0m的方法包括通过表面特征（如植被高度和叶面积指数）对其进行参数化，并使用解析足迹模型将z0m与粗糙元素的方向特征和空间分布相关联。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes of integrating remote sensing data with ground measurement data in improving estimates of water and heat fluxes at a regional scale?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 将遥感数据与地面测量数据结合起来，可能会在区域尺度上改善水分和热量通量估计的潜在结果有哪些？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Integrating remote sensing data with ground measurement data can improve estimates of water and heat fluxes by providing more accurate land surface information at the regional scale. This integration creates new opportunities for monitoring these fluxes and can help upscale observations from the patch to the regional scale. However, it also introduces challenges due to uncertainties in model parameters and structures, which need to be addressed through techniques like data assimilation.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 将遥感数据与地面测量数据相结合，可以通过提供更准确的区域土地表面信息来改善水分和热量通量的估计。这种整合为监测这些通量创造了新的机会，并有助于将观测结果从局部尺度上升到区域尺度。然而，由于模型参数和结构的不确定性，这也带来了挑战，需要通过数据同化等技术来解决。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the implications of having a sparse monitoring network for ground measurements on the global coverage of water and heat flux data?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 稀疏的监测网络对全球水和热通量数据的地面测量覆盖的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: A sparse monitoring network for ground measurements limits the global coverage of water and heat flux data, necessitating the upscaling of observations from the patch to the regional scale. This situation underscores the need for alternative methods such as remote sensing and data assimilation to enhance the spatial and temporal coverage of flux measurements, despite the challenges posed by uncertainties in model outputs.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 稀疏的监测网络对于地面测量限制了水和热通量数据的全球覆盖，迫切需要将观测结果从局部尺度上升到区域尺度。这种情况凸显了采用遥感和数据同化等替代方法的必要性，以增强通量测量的空间和时间覆盖，尽管模型输出的不确定性带来了挑战。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary goal of using automatic meteorological stations to collect data on air temperature, humidity, and soil moisture in the specified region?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 使用自动气象站收集指定区域的空气温度、湿度和土壤湿度数据的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary goal of using automatic meteorological stations is to accurately estimate water and heat fluxes, which are crucial for climate change research, water resource planning and management, and water-saving agriculture applications.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 使用自动气象站的主要目标是准确估计水分和热量的通量，这对于气候变化研究、水资源规划与管理以及节水农业应用至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are involved in ensuring data quality control for an automatic meteorological station collecting multi-scale surface flux and meteorological elements?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 确保自动气象站收集多尺度表面通量和气象元素的数据质量控制的程序步骤包括哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The data quality control procedure involves ensuring there are 144 data points daily (each every 10 minutes), marking missing data with -6999, removing duplicate records, deleting data that are physically meaningless or beyond the instrument's range, and unifying the format of date and time, placing them in the same column.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 数据质量控制程序包括确保每天有144个数据点（每10分钟一个），用-6999标记缺失数据，删除重复记录，删除物理上无意义或超出仪器范围的数据，并统一日期和时间的格式，将它们放在同一列中。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can one determine the applicability of the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory (MOST) for analyzing data from large aperture scintillometer (LAS) observations under different environmental conditions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何确定在不同环境条件下，使用大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）观测数据时，Monin-Obukhov相似理论（MOST）的适用性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To determine the applicability of MOST, one must analyze the data under unstable conditions where large-scale eddy motion, atmospheric turbulence development, and temperature scale significantly affect MOST applicability. Two new methods, factor analysis and temperature structure parameter methods, can be established and verified for reliability.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了确定MOST的适用性，必须在不稳定条件下分析数据，在这些条件下，大规模涡动、大气湍流的发展和温度尺度显著影响MOST的适用性。可以建立并验证两种新方法，即因子分析和温度结构参数方法，以确保其可靠性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural methods are utilized to calculate the aerodynamic roughness length (z0m) over heterogeneous surfaces using experimental data?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 用于利用实验数据计算异质表面上气动粗糙长度（z0m）的程序方法有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The calculation of z0m involves using characteristic parameters of roughness elements, such as vegetation height and leaf area index, to compute z0m for each surface component. Then, the overall z0m for the experimental field is aggregated using a footprint weighting method, which takes into account directional characteristics and heterogeneity.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: z0m的计算涉及使用粗糙元素的特征参数，如植被高度和叶面积指数，来计算每个表面组分的z0m。然后，使用足迹加权方法聚合实验场的整体z0m，该方法考虑了方向特征和异质性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methods allow for the seamless integration of multiple data assimilation strategies to enhance the estimation of water and heat fluxes in regional climate models?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法可以实现多种数据同化策略的无缝集成，以增强区域气候模型中水分和热量通量的估计？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The integration of data assimilation strategies is enabled by combining remote sensing products like MODIS LST with land surface models such as the Common Land Model (CLM), using optimization algorithms like the Ensemble Kalman Filter (EnKF) and the SCE-UA to adjust soil temperature and moisture, thereby improving flux estimates.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 数据同化策略的整合是通过将遥感产品如MODIS地表温度（LST）与地表模型如通用陆地模型（CLM）相结合，使用优化算法如集合卡尔曼滤波器（EnKF）和SCE-UA来调整土壤温度和湿度，从而改善通量估计。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do technological advancements in scintillometer design enable the measurement of surface fluxes over both homogeneous and heterogeneous land surfaces?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 技术进步在闪烁计设计中如何使得能够测量均匀和非均匀地表的表面通量？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Advancements in scintillometer design, such as the large aperture scintillometer (LAS), enable the measurement of surface fluxes over larger areas by matching the scale of satellite pixel sizes and numerical model grids, thus providing ground-truth data for remote sensing models and climate models.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 闪烁计设计的进展，例如大孔径闪烁计（LAS），使得能够在更大区域内测量表面通量，从而与卫星像素大小和数值模型网格相匹配，为遥感模型和气候模型提供地面真实数据。

Enablement.QuestionEn: In what ways do analytical footprint models facilitate the estimation of aerodynamic roughness length over heterogeneous surfaces?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 分析足迹模型通过以下方式促进了对异质表面气动粗糙长度的估计：
Enablement.AnswerEn: Analytical footprint models facilitate the estimation of aerodynamic roughness length by calculating individual roughness lengths over different surface components based on roughness element characteristics, and then aggregating these using footprint weighting to account for directional dependencies.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 分析足迹模型通过根据粗糙元素特征计算不同表面组件的个别粗糙长度，从而促进了气动粗糙长度的估算，然后使用足迹加权进行聚合，以考虑方向依赖性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why could the iterative process for calculating sensible heat flux using large aperture scintillometers fail to converge under certain conditions?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用大孔径闪烁仪计算显热通量的迭代过程在某些条件下可能无法收敛的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The iteration process of HLAS cannot converge when low wind speed and very stable conditions appear at night, which presents a challenge in accurately measuring sensible heat flux under these conditions.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在低风速和非常稳定的夜间条件下，HLAS的迭代过程无法收敛，这给在这些条件下准确测量显热通量带来了挑战。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might data assimilation strategies be necessary to improve the accuracy of water and heat flux estimates in land surface models?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 数据同化策略为何在提高陆面模型中水分和热量通量估计的准确性方面是必要的？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Data assimilation strategies are necessary because land model output is strongly contaminated by uncertainties within the model parameters, model structures, and forcing data, adversely affecting the development and application of land surface models. Combining land surface models with different types of observations, such as MODIS LST products, helps to improve predictions.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 数据同化策略是必要的，因为陆地模型输出受到模型参数、模型结构和强迫数据中的不确定性强烈污染，这对陆面模型的发展和应用产生了不利影响。将陆面模型与不同类型的观测数据（如MODIS LST产品）结合，有助于改善预测。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what are the challenges that might arise in scaling local meteorological observations to regional or global contexts, and how could these be addressed?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在将地方气象观测扩展到区域或全球背景时，可能会出现哪些挑战，以及如何解决这些挑战？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The challenges in scaling local meteorological observations to regional or global contexts include the insufficient coverage of monitoring networks, the variability in land surface conditions, and the uncertainties in model parameters and structures. Addressing these challenges could involve integrating remote sensing data, developing advanced data assimilation techniques, and enhancing land surface models to improve the accuracy and applicability of observations at larger scales.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 将地方气象观测扩展到区域或全球背景中的挑战包括监测网络覆盖不足、地表条件的变化性以及模型参数和结构的不确定性。解决这些挑战可以通过整合遥感数据、开发先进的数据同化技术以及增强地表模型来提高观测在更大尺度上的准确性和适用性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your evaluation of the suitability of the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory (MOST) in estimating surface fluxes across different environmental conditions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您对Monin-Obukhov相似理论（MOST）在不同环境条件下估算表面通量的适用性有何评价？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The suitability of the Monin-Obukhov Similarity Theory (MOST) in estimating surface fluxes is generally strong, but it can be influenced by factors such as varying wind speeds, atmospheric stability, and surface heterogeneity. The development of new methods, like factor analysis and temperature structure parameter methods, can help in providing more reliable assessments of MOST applicability in different environmental conditions.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: Monin-Obukhov相似理论（MOST）在估算表面通量方面的适用性通常较强，但可能受到风速变化、大气稳定性和表面异质性等因素的影响。新方法的发展，如因子分析和温度结构参数方法，可以帮助在不同环境条件下提供对MOST适用性更可靠的评估。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how data assimilation techniques can improve the accuracy of land surface models.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解数据同化技术如何提高陆面模型的准确性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Data assimilation techniques, like those mentioned in the research, combine observations, such as MODIS LST products, with land surface models to adjust key parameters like soil temperature and moisture. This integration helps to refine model predictions by reducing uncertainties in parameters and forcing data, thereby improving the accuracy of water and heat flux estimates.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 数据同化技术，如研究中提到的，将观测数据（如MODIS地表温度产品）与陆面模型结合，以调整关键参数，如土壤温度和湿度。这种整合有助于通过减少参数和强迫数据的不确定性来精炼模型预测，从而提高水分和热量通量估计的准确性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand why large aperture scintillometers are preferred for measuring surface fluxes over traditional methods.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白为什么大型孔径闪烁仪在测量表面通量时比传统方法更受欢迎。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Large aperture scintillometers are favored because they can measure surface fluxes over larger scales, from several hundred meters to kilometers, which aligns better with satellite pixel sizes and model grid scales. This capability allows for improved validation and optimization of remote sensing models and climate models compared to traditional methods like eddy covariance, which have smaller spatial representativeness.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 大孔径闪烁仪受到青睐，因为它们可以在几百米到几公里的更大尺度上测量表面通量，这与卫星像素大小和模型网格尺度更为一致。这一能力使得相较于传统方法（如涡度协方差），能够更好地验证和优化遥感模型和气候模型，因为后者的空间代表性较小。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please provide a detailed exploration of the methodologies used to upscale ground-based meteorological observations to regional scales, specifically focusing on how remote sensing methods can be integrated into this process.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请提供对将地面气象观测数据上升到区域尺度的详细探讨，特别关注如何将遥感方法整合到这一过程中。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The process of upscaling ground-based meteorological observations involves integrating remote sensing methods to capture land surface information accurately at a regional scale. By combining land surface models with observations, particularly through data assimilation techniques, researchers can improve estimates of water and heat fluxes. The integration of MODIS LST products with models like the Common Land Model (CLM) is one example, where soil temperature and moisture are adjusted to enhance predictions.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 将地面气象观测数据进行上升尺度处理的过程涉及整合遥感方法，以准确捕捉区域尺度的地表信息。通过将地表模型与观测数据结合，特别是通过数据同化技术，研究人员可以改善水分和热量通量的估计。将MODIS LST产品与常见陆地模型（CLM）结合的例子就是其中之一，在这个过程中，土壤温度和湿度被调整，以增强预测的准确性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please discuss the data assimilation strategies that improve the estimation of surface temperature and water and heat fluxes, and evaluate the effectiveness of using different optimization algorithms in this context.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请讨论改善地表温度、水分和热量通量估计的数据同化策略，并评估在此背景下使用不同优化算法的有效性。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Data assimilation strategies involve combining MODIS LST products with land surface models to improve estimates of surface temperature and water and heat fluxes. Two strategies are used: adjusting soil temperature and adjusting soil moisture.
